### Visualize Soil distribution

![Soil Map from Benjamin Nowak](images/soil-map.jpg)

With the [github-repository](https://github.com/BjnNowak/TidyTuesday/blob/main/SC_texture.R) of Benjamin Nowak, we can visualize the soil distribution in France.

He also uses the [ggtern](http://www.ggtern.com/d/2.2.0/) package to visualize the soil distribution in France.
